title: Western Mini Shooter
creator: Great Play Games - Top Free Apps

extendedInfo.description: â TWIN-STICK SHOOTERDownload this exciting twin-stick shooter: 15 upgradeable weapons, 8 enemies and unique scenarios!â CHUCK WESTNinjas and Aliens are taking over the Wild West! Now, the lonely gunfighter known as Chuck West is the last hope to defeat them.Help the fearless cowboy in his mission to wipe out this crazy invasion.If you think you're badass enough, try your abilities in Survival mode.â FEATURES- Survival and Campaign Mode- Choose between auto and manual aim- A variety of explosives in this exciting Twin-stick shooter- Get new hats to be trendy- Discover powerfull special alien weapons- Use different mounts to be faster and stronger- Earn rewards for keeping the towns free from ninjas and aliens- Over 15 upgradeable weapons- Massive waves of intelligent enemies- Special Bonus Stage- Three levels of difficultyâ NOT YOUR AVERAGE COWBOY GAMEPlease, note that "Cowboy vs. Ninjas vs. Aliens" isn't your average cowboy game. In this game you fight aliens (Cowboy vs. Aliens!) and ninjas (Cowboy vs. Ninjas!). But you will not fight zombies (Cowboy vs. Zombies) on this version. :(Also, please, do not mistake this game with the movie Cowboys & Aliens, we are not related with them.If you like cowboy wallpapers, we are working to launch some by the end of the year.â CONNECT WITH UShttp://www.facebook.com/CowboyNinjasAliens

reviews.title: Cowboys vs aliens vs ninjas
reviews.comment: Every time it loads an ad comes up. This freezes the game and reverts to home on your phone. This game is good but this issue makes the entire game unplayable now. Don\'t waste time getting this game! Even worse I payed money for no ads and every week its draining my account, and I still have ads, and I can\'t uninstall it. DON\'T GET THIS APP!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ooo. God wtf..
reviews.comment: Nah. This game is good. Nice action. Nice graphics. A must. Download. Cause its awesome. Great job, guys. Thank you.

reviews.title: Brilliant Game
reviews.comment: Plenty Addicting This game;they\'re always coming at you from all angles, in that it reminds me of smash tv. The onslaught is almost constant but you can always find a way to escape while exploring for hidden items. Brilliant Game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great shooter
reviews.comment: Great shooter game! With great gameplay, awesome weapons and upgrades and best of all, you dont have to pay real money to get all weapons and upgrades, well except for one which is the pegasus horse but other than that its great I highly reconmmend it for mini gore and monster shooter fans
reviews.author: John Jay

reviews.title: Great Top Down Shooter
reviews.comment: One of the more expertly crafted shooters worthy of being placed along side the greats like monster shooter. Don\'t waste time deciding whether you want to use up the space on your android, get this now and then go delete  your shovelware later.
reviews.author: LeeVon White

reviews.title: This is MAlARKEY
reviews.comment: This is the my absolute favorite game and I cant play it. First off I don\'t receive credit for $6.99 in game purchase and developers wont respond to my emails but still keep playing. Now whenever I get about 8 hours or so into the game it randomly loses my data and starts over new. 4 other say the same happened to them.

reviews.title: Yihaa!
reviews.comment: Nice impression at first but when I realize flaws, it turns me off. Graphics should improve. Also, the game lags, can\'t play it continuously. Please fix it. I like that you can customize the hats and buy new animals to ride on. I wish I can customize the clothes too. I like the movie clips. There\'s a room for improvement.
